Title: Beloved comrade Xiaoping - The general architect
Publisher: Sichuan meishu chubanshe (四川美术出版社)
Notes: Deng Xiaoping hates personality cults and for a long time manages to avoid being featured on posters. Only at the end of his life he is no longer able to stop it. In the background in this poster is a modern port, probably meant to signify the Special Economic Zones policy.
